text:
Sara Anzanello (July 30, 1980 – October 25, 2018) was an Italian volleyball player in the middle hitter-blocker role. Anzanello was born in San Donà di Piave, Venice. She played for Italy national team in 1998, when she was 17 years old. She had a total of 203 caps for her team.
Anzanello died on October 25, 2018 from leukemia in Venice at the age of 38.
